Tips and anecdotes culled from SeganÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Italian travels enhance the easy-to-follow directions, and a glossary of more than 50 extraordinary dried pastas showcases shapes to revive any pasta loverÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s repertoire.
